availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Sommerville Roberts Conder in Owen County, Kentucky, on June 9, 1836. Father of Mary E. Conder, Martha A. Conder, and America S. Conder. Carpenter in Owen County in 1850. Carpenter in Owen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, p. 223A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 1, p. 4.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film #000272770.
Find A Grave, "David Conder (1814-1904)," Memorial #74215272, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/74215272 (accessed June 17, 2020).
